James (Jim) Rector
==================

![](https://www.clyde-tx.gov/sites/g/files/vyhlif11711/files/styles/directory_listings_body_with_photo/public/media/bc-cc/image/51/jim_rector.jpg.webp?itok=4e7HJ4O7 "jim_rector.jpg")

Profile

James (Jim) Rector was born & raised in Lockhart, Tx.Â  He graduated from Sam Houston State University with a Bachelor of Arts in Teaching degree in 1978.Â  He also graduated from Tarleton State University with a Master of Education degree in 1993.Â  After 37 years as an educator, Jim retired.

Jim and his wife, Debra, moved to Clyde in 1996 where he served 12 years as the high school assistant principal.Â  He previously served on the Clyde City Council from 2002 â€“ 2012.Â Â  Jim is now enjoying his retirement at the golf course and spending time with his 3 sons and their families.
